page_content:
Users

Version:MissionOS_2.0

You can create setup profiles for users in MissionOS application using the Admin Setup menu.

You can perform the following steps to access the User’s page:

In Data Manager, navigate to Admin > Setup > Users.

 



Follow the steps below to create a user:

  1. Type the User Name.
  2. Type the password or click Generate.
    As you click Generate, a password gets created.
  3. Select the User Type from the dropdown.
  4. Enter the mobile number of the user, based on the instructions given at the Question Mark icon.
  5. Enter the company name.
  6. Select the following checkboxes based on the requirements:
  • Prohibit portal access – select this option to disable portal access to the user.
  • Prohibit Status Notification – select this option to disallow status notifications for user.
  1. Select the Responsibility Group.
  2. Select the Shift Report User Type.
  3. Select the User Accessible to Planned Shift checkbox if required.
  4. Enter the name of the user.
  5. Enter the email of the user.
  6. Select the following checkboxes based on requirements of the user:
  • Receive blog updates from – General, Review
  • Review Mail notification – Alert, Action, Review Check, Alarm
  • Review SMS notification - Alert, Action, Review Check, Alarm
  • Reporting – to enable this functionality
  • AAA Reporting – to enable this functionality
  • IMR Reporting - to enable this functionality
  • Enable Review Level Upload/Edit
  1. Select the User Group to assign the user.
  2. Select the option Access To. (Select from the applications)
  3. Finally, click Add User.
    The user details get listed in the table below.

 

Note:

  • You can search the table for a specific user using the Search functionality.
  • You can edit and delete a user detail.

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on How to Setup Users in MissionOS, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

videos.title: How To: Setup Users in MissionOS
